review: I love it! It is super easy to use and maneuver throughout the menu. I love not having to set up my laptop to stream Netflix and worrying about connecting all sorts of different things. Best part-it sits in the back so you don't even see it!
author: palj

review: Handled all apps effortlessly, with the exception of Plex. We use Plex as our default application for streaming local content. The application would frequently cut out or freeze the device entirely. This did not happen with the Chromecast. 1 star off for that, but I'm sure an update will resolve these issues. Other than that, its a great device.
